directions: Pour rye whiskey, carrot juice, simple syrup, and quinquina wine into a cocktail shaker; cover and shake twice to mix. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with tarragon.
ingredients: 1 1/4 fluid ounces rye whiskey (such as Bulleit™)
1/2 fluid ounce quinquina wine (such as Bonal Gentiane Quina®
title: Friday Harbor House's Carrot Cocktail
